name: Timore 5
description: Timore 5 is an indie horror game, 5th one in Timore series. A scientist named Frank has done a lot inventing new things, but his experiments aren't without the consequences. In this game Frank will try to record his dreams and convert them to computer data, allowing him to review his dreams later, but the experiment might not go as...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7/Vista/XP Processor: CPU Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 387 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Nice game, much better than the last one (Timore: inferno). Graphics look better, story is quite interesting and gameplay is intense.
